metadata.synopsis: Party reacts to Shar's voice in the temple and acknowledging it is Shar's voice.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Approach the shar statue at -754; -6; -753 in SCL_Main1.a Or trigger any other voice of shar moment in SHA2. Wait for Shar AD to finish3. VB plays.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A voice... is that Shar herself, who speaks...?
